title: tomcc : 已经在AppStore下架盗版Minecraft
author: 呆瓜Domado
txt_content:
本帖最后由 2641324669 于 2016-1-8 18:44 编辑 

Tommaso Checchi ?@_tomcc
2016/1/8 7:25分北京时间


RIP Minecraft: Pocket Edition 2, I hardly knew ye.
安息吧！ Minecraft PE 2, 我几乎不认识你们！


Some guy put a fake app called “MCPE 2” on the AppStore, 
made tons of money until it was pulled when Apple realized the mistake. Fun stuffs.
一些人在Appstore上制作了一个假的MCPE叫做MCPE 2，他们赚了很多钱之后苹果公司才认识到自己的错误。真有趣啊！

replies.author: 你持盾吗
replies.txt_content: 233333当时移除食材收割机是也是这么说的，顺便大快人心{:10_492:}

replies.author: ws1918827377
replies.txt_content: <s>被标题吓到了，幸好我是正版</s>

replies.author: 像素君
replies.txt_content: 呵呵~据说是个很无聊的游戏~

replies.txt_content:
